summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.3°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 627 m) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1577 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 3971 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and near calm conditions. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
